paragraphs.text: Agree with your article and recognized many of your concerns as I went through depression myself.
paragraphs.name: 73b7

paragraphs.text: It came out of nowhere (so I thought) with severe vertigo (including vomiting) I was unable to eat, to get up and take care of myself — my luck or better yet my savior, was a doctor/friend who came to my house and saw the state…
paragraphs.name: aad9

a369a9e37c19.title: Thank you Aurorasa Sima, I’m finding there are still many people who can’t talk openly about this…

paragraphs.text: Thank you Aurorasa Sima, I’m finding there are still many people who can’t talk openly about this illness due to the stigma attached. I have so many people message me privately, this is disturbing that it’s now 2017, and people are viewed as weak vs. ill.
paragraphs.name: 9e27

paragraphs.text: 5 easy & practical things men can do for their women
It is rare to read something which makes you meditate for long. This write-up (‘Depression Is An Illness, Not A Weakness’) has been one such instance in a long time.
paragraphs.name: c6b3

455a12cd129a.title: Beautifully writen and explained. Thank you for sharing your personal journey!

paragraphs.text: Beautifully writen and explained. Thank you for sharing your personal journey!
paragraphs.name: d048

paragraphs.text: You are wonderful Puneet Srivastava!! These are such great tips. Engaging in meaningful work other than your career is very important. When we help others, it takes our mind off of ourselves and it always makes one happy to know you may be making a difference in someone else’s life. I love the photo and learning about your teachings. Thank you so…
Talking is good. I’m glad you talk. Thanks for raising awareness for a topic and problem that is still underestimated and ignored.
paragraphs.name: ded1

d268b803eda4.title: Most people don’t know that depression changes your brain.

content.subtitle: It’s not just depression, though. Overweight people have the same problem. Stalking victims, people with ticks etc …

virtuals.subtitle: It’s not just depression, though. Overweight people have the same problem. Stalking victims, people with ticks etc …

paragraphs.text: Most people don’t know that depression changes your brain. It’s hard for them to put themselves into a situation outside of their experience scope.
paragraphs.name: 8b08

paragraphs.text: It’s not just depression, though. Overweight people have the same problem. Stalking victims, people with ticks etc …
Thanks dear Lisa.
paragraphs.name: 9fe3

98254af90193.title: Hi Puneet Srivastava, I’m sorry I just found this!

paragraphs.text: Hi Puneet Srivastava, I’m sorry I just found this! Thank you VERY much for linking your article back to mine, I feel honored. You brought up some great points and I love the tips you give men with regards to how they can help women that are suffering. I really like the idea of cooking for them! Listening without offering advice is also a great piece…
